item.description: SpocWebEntityId: {{SpocWebEntityId}} PrincipleSubId: {{PrincipleSubId}} [name::{{name}}] {{Description}}
[name::3D Mouse] [SpocWebEntityId::22440] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-move-in-space]]] Infrared Computer Mouse moves in Space, instead of on a Surface, for Presentations.
[name::5-axis Position] [SpocWebEntityId::22441] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-move-in-space]]] Five-axis Cutting Tool can be positioned where needed.

[name::abrasive Feeder] [SpocWebEntityId::22491] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-add-functions]]] To prevent Wear in a Feeder which distributes an abrasive Material, its Surface is made from the abrasive Material.
[name::acoustic Fence] [SpocWebEntityId::22503] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-add-sensor]]] Replace a physical Fence to confine a Dog or Cat with an acoustic 'Fence' (signal audible to the Animal).
[name::Add Foam] [SpocWebEntityId::22387] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-weigt-lift]]] Inject foaming Agent into a Bundle of Logs, to make it float better.

[name::adding inert Ingredients] [SpocWebEntityId::22552] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-inert-additives]]] Increase the Volume of powdered Detergent by adding inert Ingredients. This makes it easier to measure with conventional Tools.
[name::adiabatic Operation] [SpocWebEntityId::22469] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-high-speed]]] Cut Plastic faster than Heat can propagate in the Material, to avoid deforming the Shape.
[name::Adjustable Controls] [SpocWebEntityId::22428] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-optimal-conditions]]] Adjustable steering wheel (or Seat, or Back Support, or Mirror Position…)

[name::adjustable Dampers] [SpocWebEntityId::22537] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-flexibility]]] Use adjustable Dampers to reduce the Noise of Parts falling into a Container by restricting the Motion of the Walls of the Container.
[name::AGC] [SpocWebEntityId::22478] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-feedback]]] Automatic Volume Control in Audio Circuits
[name::Alternate System] [SpocWebEntityId::22407] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-prepare-emergency]]] Alternate Air System for Aircraft Instruments
[name::Amplitude Modulation] [SpocWebEntityId::22462] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-vary-oscillations]]] Replace a continuous Siren with Sound that changes Amplitude and Frequency.
[name::Arches and Domes] [SpocWebEntityId::22422] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-curved-shape]]] Use Arches and Domes for Strength in Architecture.
[name::Argon Atmosphere] [SpocWebEntityId::22551] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-inert-environment]]] Prevent Degradation of a hot Metal Filament by using an Argon Atmosphere.
[name::astigmatic optics] [SpocWebEntityId::22362] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-increase-Asymmetry]]] Use astigmatic optics to merge colors.

[name::Asymmetric-mixing] [SpocWebEntityId::22357] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-asymmetrical]]] Asymmetrical Mixing Vessels or asymmetrical Vanes in symmetrical Vessels improve Mixing (Cement Trucks, Cake Mixers, Blenders).
[name::Asymmetric-tire] [SpocWebEntityId::22359] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-asymmetrical]]] Make one Side of a Tire stronger than the other to withstand Impact with the Curb.
[name::Audio Seminar] [SpocWebEntityId::22497] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-copies]]] Listen to an Audio Tape instead of attending a Seminar.

[name::Auto-tuning Engines] [SpocWebEntityId::22533] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-restore-consumable]]] Automobile Engines that give themselves a 'tune up' while running (the ones that say '100_000 miles between tune ups')
[name::Back-up] [SpocWebEntityId::22406] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-prepare-emergency]]] Back-up Parachute
[name::Backfire] [SpocWebEntityId::22477] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-amplify-harm]]] Use a Backfire to eliminate the Fuel from a Forest Fire.

[name::BiMetal Spring] [SpocWebEntityId::22545] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-different-materials]]] The basic Leaf Spring Thermostat: BiMetal(2 Metals with different Coefficients of Expansion are linked so that it bends one Way when warmer than nominal and the opposite Way when cooler.

[name::bipolar Film against Evaporation] [SpocWebEntityId::22514] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-isolate]]] Float a Film of bipolar Material (one end hydrophilic, one end hydrophobic) on a Reservoir to limit Evaporation.

[name::Blade with Groove] [SpocWebEntityId::22399] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-anticipate-change]]] Utility Knife Blade made with a Groove allowing the dull Part of the Blade to be broken off, restoring Sharpness.
[name::both-sides] [SpocWebEntityId::22366] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-identical]]] Electronic chips mounted on both sides of a circuit board or subassembly

[name::break-symmetry] [SpocWebEntityId::22360] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-asymmetrical]]] While discharging wet Sand through a symmetrical Funnel, the Sand forms an Arch above the Opening, causing irregular Flow.
[name::Budgets] [SpocWebEntityId::22481] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-feedback]]] –Measurements are used to decide when to modify a Process.
[name::Buffer Solution] [SpocWebEntityId::22393] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-control-harm]]] Buffer a Solution to prevent harm from Extremes of pH.
[name::buffering Material] [SpocWebEntityId::22475] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-combine-harm]]] Add a buffering Material to a corrosive Solution.
[name::Bullet Casings] [SpocWebEntityId::22530] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-removed-obsolete]]] Bullet Casings are ejected after the Gun fires.
[name::Butterfly Keyboard] [SpocWebEntityId::22430] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-movable-parts]]] The 'Butterfly' Computer Keyboard, (also demonstrates Principle 7, 'Nested Doll'.

[name::Carbon Fiber Composite] [SpocWebEntityId::22554] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-composite-materials]]] Composite Epoxy Resin/Carbon Fiber Golf Club Shafts are lighter, stronger, and more flexible than Metal. Same for airplane Parts like Wings etc.
[name::Cardio-Pulmonary Respiration] [SpocWebEntityId::22463] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-pauses]]] In Cardio-Pulmonary Respiration (CPR) breathe after every 5 Chest Compressions.
[name::Carpenter's Nailset] [SpocWebEntityId::22486] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-intermediary]]] used between the Hammer and the Nail
[name::CCD] [SpocWebEntityId::22374] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-urpose]]] CCD (Charge coupled device) with micro-lenses formed on the surface
[name::change-shape] [SpocWebEntityId::22361] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-increase-Asymmetry]]] Change from circular O-rings to oval cross-section to specialized shapes to improve sealing.
[name::Change Measure] [SpocWebEntityId::22484] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-vary-feedback]]] Change a Management Measure from Budget Variance to Customer Satisfaction.
[name::Change Process] [SpocWebEntityId::22482] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-vary-feedback]]] Change Sensitivity of an Autopilot when within 5 Miles of an Airport.

[name::Change Sensitivity] [SpocWebEntityId::22483] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-vary-feedback]]] Change Sensitivity of a Thermostat when cooling vs. heating, since it uses Energy less efficiently when cooling.

[name::Chimney] [SpocWebEntityId::22511] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-fluid]]] To increase the Draft of an industrial Chimney, a Spiral Pipe with Nozzles was installed. When Air flows through the Nozzles, it creates an air-like Wall, reducing Drag.
[name::Chips on both Sides] [SpocWebEntityId::22443] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-story]]] Electronic Chips on both Sides of a printed Circuit Board
[name::Coating] [SpocWebEntityId::22515] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-isolate]]] Use a thin organic or anorganic Coating to protect Surfaces and thus the whole Structure.
[name::Compartments] [SpocWebEntityId::22353] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-condition]]] Lunch Box with special Compartments for hot and cold solid Foods and for Liquids
[name::Compost] [SpocWebEntityId::22495] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-waste]]] Use Food and Lawn Waste to create Compost.
[name::computer network] [SpocWebEntityId::22363] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-identical]]] Personal computers in a network
[name::conical Railway Wheels] [SpocWebEntityId::22429] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-optimal-conditions]]] Use conical Railway Wheels that generate a central Force to stabilize the Wagons.
[name::connect Joints] [SpocWebEntityId::22343] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Disassemble]]] Garden Hoses can be joined together to form any Length.

[name::continuous Bottleneck] [SpocWebEntityId::22466] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-continuous-load]]] Run the Bottleneck Operations in a Factory continuously, to reach the optimum Pace. (From Theory of Constraints, or Takt Time Operations)
[name::Convertible] [SpocWebEntityId::22375] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-urpose]]] Convertible Bed-Sofa or Car
[name::Convertible Seat] [SpocWebEntityId::22371] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-urpose]]] Child's car safety seat converts to a stroller
[name::Cooking] [SpocWebEntityId::22540] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-temperature]]] Raise the Temperature of Food to cook it. (Changes Taste, Aroma, Texture, chemical Properties, etc.)
[name::cool inner Part] [SpocWebEntityId::22414] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-invert-action]]] To loosen stuck Parts, cool the inner Part instead of heating the outer Part.
[name::Cornstarch-Packaging] [SpocWebEntityId::22528] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-removed-obsolete]]] Sprinkle Water on Cornstarch-based Packaging and watch it reduce its Volume by more than 1000*!
[name::Cup-Measure] [SpocWebEntityId::22377] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-in-space]]] Measuring in Cups or Spoons

[name::Curie Point] [SpocWebEntityId::22539] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-temperature]]] Raise the Temperature above the Curie Point to change a ferromagnetic Substance to a paramagnetic Substance.

[name::cylindrical-Vessel] [SpocWebEntityId::22434] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-movable-part]]] Transport Vessel with a cylindrical-shaped Body. To reduce the Draft or a Vessel under full Load, the Body is comprised of two hinged, half-cylindrical Parts which can be opened.
[name::Diamond Cutting] [SpocWebEntityId::22525] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-same-material]]] Make a Diamond Cutting Tool out of Diamonds.

[name::dip into Paint] [SpocWebEntityId::22438] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-accept-less]]] A Cylinder is painted by dipping into Paint, but contains more Paint than desired. Excess Paint is then removed by rapidly rotating the Cylinder.

[name::directed Radiation] [SpocWebEntityId::22507] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-add-structure]]] Early Communications used omnidirectional Broadcasting. We now use Antennas with very detailed Structure of the Pattern of Radiation.

[name::disappearing Actors] [SpocWebEntityId::22444] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-story]]] Employees 'disappear' from the Customers in a Theme Park, descend into a Tunnel, and walk to their next Assignment, where they return to the Surface and magically reappear.
[name::disconnect Joints] [SpocWebEntityId::22342] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Disassemble]]] Quick disconnect Joints in Plumbing.

[name::disposable Paper Objects] [SpocWebEntityId::22502] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-replace-by-multiple]]] Use disposable Paper Objects to avoid the Cost of cleaning and storing durable Objects. Plastic Cups in Motels, disposable Diapers, many kinds of medical Supplies.
[name::dissolving Capsule] [SpocWebEntityId::22527] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-removed-obsolete]]] Use a dissolving Capsule for Medicine.
[name::dried Food] [SpocWebEntityId::22401] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-anticipate-change]]] Any dried and pre-cooked Food.
[name::Dump Truck] [SpocWebEntityId::22446] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-tilt]]]
[name::Electricity from Heat] [SpocWebEntityId::22493] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-waste]]] Use Heat from a Process to generate Electricity: 'Co-generation'.

[name::electrostatically mix] [SpocWebEntityId::22505] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-EM-Field]]] To mix 2 Powders, electrostatically charge one positive and the other negative. Either use Fields to direct them, or mix them mechanically and let their acquired Fields cause the grains of Powder to pair up.
[name::Empty by inverting] [SpocWebEntityId::22421] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-upside-down]]] Empty Grain from Containers (Ship or Railroad) by inverting them.
[name::Enemy substitute] [SpocWebEntityId::22351] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Separate]]] Use the Sound, Shape, Smell etc. of an Enemy, without the Enemy itself, to repel Agents.
[name::Energy from Vibrations] [SpocWebEntityId::22452] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-vibrate]]] Use a statistical Engine to generate mechanical Energy from thermal Vibrations.
[name::Energy from Waste Heat] [SpocWebEntityId::22471] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-accept-harm]]] Use Waste Heat to generate Electric Power.
[name::etch later] [SpocWebEntityId::22437] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-accept-less]]] Oxidize the whole Substrate in MicroElectronics and etch it later.

[name::evaporating Coolant] [SpocWebEntityId::22519] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-fractal-surface]]] To avoid pumping Coolant to a Machine, some of its Parts are filled with a porous Material soaked in coolant Liquid.
[name::Extending Antenna] [SpocWebEntityId::22381] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-allow-pass]]] Extending Radio Telescope Antenna
[name::Extending Pointer] [SpocWebEntityId::22382] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-allow-pass]]]
[name::Fertilizer] [SpocWebEntityId::22494] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-waste]]] Use Animal Waste as Fertilizer.
[name::Fiber Optics] [SpocWebEntityId::22349] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Separate]]] Use Fiber Optics or a Light Pipe to separate the hot Light Source from the Location where Light is needed.

[name::Fiberglass] [SpocWebEntityId::22555] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-composite-materials]]] Fiberglass Surfboards are lighter and more controllable and easier to form into a variety of Shapes than wooden ones.
[name::flashing Light] [SpocWebEntityId::22460] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-periodic-action]]] A Warning Lamp flashes so that it is even more noticeable than when continuously lit.
[name::flat Spot] [SpocWebEntityId::22358] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-asymmetrical]]] Put a flat Spot on a cylindrical Shaft to attach a Knob securely.
[name::flexible Boroscope] [SpocWebEntityId::22431] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-movable-part]]] The flexible Boroscope for examining Engines
[name::flexible Gooseneck] [SpocWebEntityId::22433] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-movable-part]]] Flashlight with a flexible Gooseneck between the Body and the Lamp Head.
[name::flexible Sigmoidoscope] [SpocWebEntityId::22432] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-movable-part]]] The flexible Sigmoidoscope, for medical Examination

[name::Flywheel] [SpocWebEntityId::22465] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-continuous-load]]] Flywheel (or hydraulic System) stores Energy when a Vehicle stops, so the Motor can keep running at optimum Power.

[name::Foam Packaging] [SpocWebEntityId::22512] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-fluid]]] For shipping fragile Products, Air Bubble Envelopes or Foam-like Materials are used. Liquids and Gases are not worn and distribute directed Energy in all Directions.
[name::Foldable Ruler] [SpocWebEntityId::22347] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Fragment]]]

[name::Freeze liquid] [SpocWebEntityId::22534] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-aggregate]]] Freeze the liquid Centers of filled Candies, then dip in melted Chocolate, instead of handling the messy, gooey, hot Liquid.
[name::Frequency Modulation] [SpocWebEntityId::22461] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-vary-oscillations]]] Use Frequency Modulation to convey Information, instead of Morse Code.

[name::Funnel] [SpocWebEntityId::22439] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-accept-less]]] To obtain uniform Discharge of a metallic Powder from a Bin, the Hopper has a special internal Funnel which is continually overfilled to provide nearly constant Pressure.
[name::Gradient] [SpocWebEntityId::22352] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-non-uniform]]] Use a Temperature, Density, or Pressure Gradient instead of constant Temperature, Density or Pressure.
[name::Gyrocompass] [SpocWebEntityId::22479] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-feedback]]] Signal from Gyrocompass is used to control simple Aircraft Autopilots.
[name::hammer] [SpocWebEntityId::22457] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-periodic-action]]] Hitting something repeatedly with a hammer.
[name::Hammer with Nail Puller] [SpocWebEntityId::22355] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-different]]]

[name::Heat ferromagnetic Material] [SpocWebEntityId::22508] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-field]]] Heat a Substance containing ferromagnetic Material by using varying magnetic Field. When the Temperature exceeds the Curie Point, the material becomes paramagnetic, and no longer absorbs Energy.

[name::Heat Pumps] [SpocWebEntityId::22543] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-phase-transition]]] Heat Pumps use the Heat of Vaporization and Heat of Condensation of a closed thermodynamic Cycle to do useful Work.

[name::Helium-Oxygen Mix] [SpocWebEntityId::22476] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-combine-harm]]] Use a Helium-Oxygen Mix for Diving, to eliminate both Nitrogen Narcosis and Oxygen Poisoning from Air and other Nitrox Mixes.
[name::high Speed Operation] [SpocWebEntityId::22468] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-high-speed]]] Use a high Speed Dentist's Drill to avoid Heating Tissue.
[name::Holes to reduce the Weight] [SpocWebEntityId::22516] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-porous]]] Drill Holes in a Structure to reduce the Weight.
[name::Hydrofoils] [SpocWebEntityId::22391] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-weight-environment]]] Hydrofoils lift Ship out of the Water to reduce Drag.

[name::Ice Structures] [SpocWebEntityId::22529] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-removed-obsolete]]] use Water Ice or Carbon Dioxide (Dry Ice) to make a Template for a rammed Earth Structure, such as a temporary Dam.
[name::increase Variety] [SpocWebEntityId::22442] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-story]]] Cassette with 6 CD's to increase Music Time and Variety

[name::inert Gas] [SpocWebEntityId::22553] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-inert-additives]]] To prevent Cotton from catching Fire in a Warehouse, it is treated with inert Gas while being transported to the Storage Area.
[name::inflatable Structures] [SpocWebEntityId::22513] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-films]]] Use inflatable (thin film) Structures as Winter Covers on Tennis Courts.

[name::Infrared Images] [SpocWebEntityId::22501] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-IR-UV-copies]]] Make Images in Infrared to detect Heat Sources, such as Diseases in Crops, or Intruders in a security System.
[name::Ionize Air] [SpocWebEntityId::22549] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-ionizing]]] Ionize Air to trap Pollutants in an Air Cleaner.
[name::ionize Gas] [SpocWebEntityId::22550] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-ionized-oxygen]]] Speed up chemical Reactions by ionizing the Gas before Use.
[name::Kanban Arrangements] [SpocWebEntityId::22402] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-arrange-parts]]] Kanban Arrangements in a Just-In-Time Factory
[name::kill Anaerobic Bacteria] [SpocWebEntityId::22548] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-pure-oxygen]]] Treat Wounds in a high Pressure Oxygen Environment to kill Anaerobic Bacteria and aid Healing.
[name::Laser Pulses] [SpocWebEntityId::22470] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-high-speed]]] Use Laser Pulses to process Material and Surfaces without affecting it. (also Principle 19, pulsed Action)
[name::Linked slats] [SpocWebEntityId::22367] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-in-time]]] Link slats together in Venetian or vertical blinds.

[name::Liquid Hand Soap] [SpocWebEntityId::22536] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-consistency]]] Liquid Hand Soap is concentrated and more viscous than Bar Soap at the point of use, making it easier to dispense in the correct Amount and more sanitary when shared by several People.
[name::liquidate Gases] [SpocWebEntityId::22535] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-aggregate]]] Transport Oxygen or Nitrogen or Petroleum Gas as a Liquid, instead of a Gas, to reduce Volume.
[name::Lower Temperature] [SpocWebEntityId::22541] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-temperature]]] Lower the Temperature of medical Specimens to preserve them for later Analysis.
[name::Maglev Rail] [SpocWebEntityId::22506] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-EM-Field]]] The Transrapid / Maglev Rail uses magnetic Forces to drive and control the Wagons without Friction.
[name::Magnetized Merchandise] [SpocWebEntityId::22409] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-prepare-emergency]]] Magnetized Merchandise to prevent Shop Lifting
[name::Magnetized Tools] [SpocWebEntityId::22408] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-prepare-emergency]]] Magnetized Tools to hold Screws
[name::Manufacturing Cell] [SpocWebEntityId::22403] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-arrange-parts]]] Flexible Manufacturing Cell
[name::Mask-Harm] [SpocWebEntityId::22395] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-anti-stresses]]] Masking Anything before harmful Exposure: Use a Lead Apron on Parts of the Body not being exposed to X-rays.

[name::measure indirectly] [SpocWebEntityId::22485] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-vary-feedback]]] Ice and Water are measured separately but must combine to the total Weight. Because Ice is difficult to dispense precisely, it is measured first.
[name::Measure Shadow] [SpocWebEntityId::22499] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-optical-copies]]] Measure an Object by measuring the Photograph or its Shadow.
[name::Modular-Furniture] [SpocWebEntityId::22341] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Disassemble]]] Modular Furniture.
[name::modular Design] [SpocWebEntityId::22346] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Fragment]]] Replace monolithic Architectures with modular Design.
[name::Mountain to Mohammed] [SpocWebEntityId::22415] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-invert-action]]] Bring the Mountain to Mohammed, instead of bringing Mohammed to the Mountain.
[name::Moving sidewalk] [SpocWebEntityId::22417] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-movability]]] Moving sidewalk with standing People.
[name::Mulching lawnmower] [SpocWebEntityId::22369] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-in-time]]]
[name::Mulching Universality] [SpocWebEntityId::22372] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-urpose]]] Mulching lawnmower (Yes, it demonstrates both Principles 5 and 6, Merging and Universality.)
[name::Multi-Function-Seat] [SpocWebEntityId::22376] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-urpose]]] Minivan Seat for seating, sleeping, carrying Cargo

[name::Multi-Tool] [SpocWebEntityId::22356] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-different]]] Multi-Function Tool that scales Fish, acts as a Pliers, a Wire Stripper, a Flat-Blade Screwdriver, a Phillips Screwdriver, Manicure Set, etc.
[name::multiple diagnostic] [SpocWebEntityId::22368] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-in-time]]] Medical diagnostic instruments that analyze multiple blood parameters simultaneously
[name::Nautilus] [SpocWebEntityId::22423] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-balls]]] Spiral Gear (Nautilus) produces continuous Resistance for Weight Lifting.

[name::Negative thermal expansion] [SpocWebEntityId::22542] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-phase-transition]]] Water expands when frozen, unlike most other Liquids. Hannibal is reputed to have used this when marching on Rome.
[name::Nitrox] [SpocWebEntityId::22546] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-add-oxygen]]] Scuba diving with Nitrox or other non-air Mixtures for extended Endurance
[name::outside noise] [SpocWebEntityId::22348] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Separate]]] Locate a noisy Compressor outside the Building where compressed Air is needed.

[name::Over Spray] [SpocWebEntityId::22435] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-accept-less]]] Over Spray when painting, then remove Excess. (Or, use a Stencil–this is an application of Principle 3, Local Quality and Principle 9, Preliminary anti-action).
[name::Overcome Friction] [SpocWebEntityId::22450] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-vibrate]]] Overcome static Friction at lower Energies by introducing a constant Level of Energy.
[name::Oxy-Acetylene Torch] [SpocWebEntityId::22547] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-pure-oxygen]]] Cut at a higher Temperature using an Oxy-Acetylene Torch.
[name::Panama Canal] [SpocWebEntityId::22411] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-limit-changes]]] Locks in a Channel between 2 Bodies of Water
[name::parallel processor] [SpocWebEntityId::22364] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-identical]]] Thousands of microprocessors in a parallel processor computer
[name::Pencil ] [SpocWebEntityId::22380] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-in-space]]] Mechanical Pencil with Lead stored inside.
[name::Pencil with Eraser] [SpocWebEntityId::22354] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-different]]] Pencil with Eraser in one Unit
[name::Personal-Computer] [SpocWebEntityId::22338] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Partition]]] Replace Mainframe Computer by Personal Computers.
[name::photographic Film] [SpocWebEntityId::22405] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-prepare-emergency]]] Magnetic Strip on photographic Film that directs the Developer to compensate for poor Exposure

[name::Photolithography] [SpocWebEntityId::22521] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-transparency]]] Use Photolithography to change transparent Material to a solid Mask for Semiconductor Processing. Similarly, change mask material from transparent to opaque for silk screen processing.
[name::Portable System] [SpocWebEntityId::22379] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-in-space]]] Portable Audio System (microphone fits inside Transmitter, which fits inside Amplifier Case)
[name::Pot Holder] [SpocWebEntityId::22487] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-temporarily]]] Pot Holder to carry hot Dishes to the Table.
[name::Pre-pasted] [SpocWebEntityId::22397] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-anticipate-change]]] Pre-pasted Wall Paper
[name::Pre-stress] [SpocWebEntityId::22394] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-anti-stresses]]] Pre-stress Rebar before pouring Concrete.
[name::Preparing Work Area] [SpocWebEntityId::22404] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-arrange-parts]]] Preparing and cleaning Work Area
[name::Pulsed Energy] [SpocWebEntityId::22459] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-periodic-action]]] An Impact Wrench loosens corroded Nuts using Impulses rather than continuous Force.

[name::Pulsed Operation] [SpocWebEntityId::22464] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-periodic-action]]] Use Pulsed Operation instead of continuous to increase Signal to Noise Ratio while not exceeding inert Heat Production(also Principle 21, Rushing through).
[name::pulsed Sound] [SpocWebEntityId::22458] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-periodic-action]]] Replace a continuous Siren with a pulsed Sound.
[name::Quartz Oscillations] [SpocWebEntityId::22455] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-piezo-electric]]] Quartz Crystal Oscillations drive high Accuracy Clocks.
[name::Rear Wing] [SpocWebEntityId::22392] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-weight-environment]]] Rear Wing of a Racing Car increases Pressure to the Ground.
[name::recorder and timekeeper] [SpocWebEntityId::22373] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-urpose]]] Team leader acts as recorder and timekeeper.
[name::Recycle Waste] [SpocWebEntityId::22472] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-accept-harm]]] Recycle Waste (Scrap) Material from one Process as Raw Materials for another.
[name::regenerate Structure] [SpocWebEntityId::22489] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-add-functions]]] Halogen Lamps regenerate the Filament during Use–evaporated Material is redeposited.
[name::Retractable Gear] [SpocWebEntityId::22385] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-allow-pass]]] Retractable Aircraft Landing Gear Stow inside the Fuselage (also demonstrates Principle 15, Dynamism).
[name::Roller Point Pens] [SpocWebEntityId::22424] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-balls]]] Ball Point and Roller Point Pens for smooth Ink Distribution.
[name::Rotate Part] [SpocWebEntityId::22416] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-movability]]] Rotate the Part instead of the Tool.
[name::Russian Dolls] [SpocWebEntityId::22378] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-in-space]]]
[name::Safe Lights] [SpocWebEntityId::22520] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-color]]] Use Safe Lights in a photographic Darkroom.
[name::same Material-Container] [SpocWebEntityId::22524] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-same-material]]] Make the Container out of the same Material as the Contents, to reduce chemical Reactions.

[name::same Material-Feeder] [SpocWebEntityId::22526] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-same-material]]] The Surface of a Feeder for abrasive Grain is made of the same Material that runs through the Feeder, allowing a continuous Restoration of the Surface.
[name::Seat Belt] [SpocWebEntityId::22384] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-allow-pass]]] Retraction Mechanism
[name::Self-Sharpening] [SpocWebEntityId::22532] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-restore-consumable]]] Self-Sharpening Lawn Mower Blades
[name::separate Rocket Boosters] [SpocWebEntityId::22531] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-removed-obsolete]]] Rocket Boosters separate after serving their Function.
[name::Shoe Sole inserts] [SpocWebEntityId::22509] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-fluid]]] Comfortable Shoe Sole inserts filled with Gel

[name::Skillets] [SpocWebEntityId::22412] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-limit-changes]]] 'Skillets' in an automobile plant that bring all tools to the right position (also demonstrates Principle 10, Preliminary Action)
[name::Skin Effect] [SpocWebEntityId::22473] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-accept-harm]]] Use high frequency Current Skin Effect to treat Metal Surfaces.

[name::smelling Compound] [SpocWebEntityId::22504] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-add-sensor]]] Use a bad smelling Compound in natural Gas to alert users to Leakage, instead of a mechanical or electrical Sensor.

[name::Solenoid ] [SpocWebEntityId::22492] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-add-functions]]] In an electric Welding Gun, the Rod is advanced by a special Device. To simplify the System, the Rod is advanced by a Solenoid controlled by the Welding Current.
[name::Sonogram] [SpocWebEntityId::22500] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-optical-copies]]] Make Sonograms to evaluate the Health of a Fetus, instead of risking Damage by direct Testing.
[name::Sound only] [SpocWebEntityId::22350] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Separate]]] Use the Sound of a barking Dog, without the Dog, as a Burglar Alarm.
[name::Space Photographs] [SpocWebEntityId::22498] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-optical-copies]]] Do surveying from Space Photographs instead of on the Ground.
[name::spherical Casters] [SpocWebEntityId::22427] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-rotation]]] Use spherical Casters instead of cylindrical Wheels to move Furniture.
[name::spinning Clothes] [SpocWebEntityId::22426] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-rotation]]] Replace wringing Clothes to remove Water with spinning Clothes in a Washing Machine.

[name::Sponge for Gases] [SpocWebEntityId::22518] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-fractal-surface]]] Store Hydrogen in the Pores of a Palladium Sponge. (Fuel 'Tank' for the Hydrogen Car–much safer than storing Hydrogen Gas)
[name::Spring loaded Delivery] [SpocWebEntityId::22410] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-limit-changes]]] Spring loaded Parts Delivery System in a Factory
[name::Stackable] [SpocWebEntityId::22386] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-allow-pass]]] Chairs or Connectors that stack onto each other for Storage or Operation.
[name::Stacked Circuits] [SpocWebEntityId::22445] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-story]]] Stack Microelectronic hybrid Circuits to improve Density.

[name::Statistical Process Control] [SpocWebEntityId::22480] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-feedback]]] (SPC) – Measurements are used to decide when to modify a Process. (Not all Feedback Systems are Automated!
[name::Sterilize] [SpocWebEntityId::22398] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-anticipate-change]]] Sterilize all Instruments needed for a surgical Procedure on a Sealed Tray.
[name::Store Energy] [SpocWebEntityId::22510] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-fluid]]] Store Energy from decelerating a Vehicle in a hydraulic System, then use the stored Energy to accelerate later.

[name::Tape] [SpocWebEntityId::22400] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-anticipate-change]]] Rubber Cement in a Bottle is difficult to apply neatly and uniformly. Instead, it is formed into a Tape so that the proper Amount can be more easily applied.

[name::thermal fitting] [SpocWebEntityId::22544] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-thermal-expansion]]] Fit a tight Joint together by cooling the inner Part to contract, heating the outer Part to expand, putting the Joint together, and returning to Equilibrium.
[name::Tilted Greenhouse Walls] [SpocWebEntityId::22448] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-tilt]]] Tilted Greenhouse Walls and Reflector on the North Side.
[name::tilted Wine Hills] [SpocWebEntityId::22447] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-tilt]]] Planting Wine on tilted River Hills instead of Planes.
[name::Tool-reservoir] [SpocWebEntityId::22370] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-multi-urpose]]] Handle of a toothbrush contains toothpaste
[name::top off] [SpocWebEntityId::22436] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-accept-less]]] Fill, then 'top off' when filling the Gas Tank of your Car or a hot Water Bottle.
[name::Trackball] [SpocWebEntityId::22425] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-rotation]]] Produce linear Motion of the Cursor on the Computer Screen using a Mouse or a Trackball.
[name::Trailer] [SpocWebEntityId::22339] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Partition]]] Replace a large Truck by a Truck and Trailer.
[name::transparent Bandage] [SpocWebEntityId::22522] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-transparency]]] A transparent Bandage enabling a Wound to be inspected without removing the Dressing.
[name::Treadmill] [SpocWebEntityId::22418] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-movability]]] for Walking or Running in Place
[name::turbulent Currents] [SpocWebEntityId::22474] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-accept-harm]]] Use turbulent Currents to heat Copper Pans and Pots or to brake electrical Trains.
[name::twisted Pipes] [SpocWebEntityId::22396] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-anti-stresses]]] Reinforced Shaft made from several Pipes which have been previously twisted.
[name::ultrasonic Destruction] [SpocWebEntityId::22454] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-resonate]]] Destroy Gall Stones or Kidney Stones using ultrasonic Resonance.
[name::ultrasonic Mixing] [SpocWebEntityId::22456] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-combined-oscillations]]] Mixing Alloys in an Induction Furnace using ultrasonic Waves.
[name::upside down] [SpocWebEntityId::22420] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-upside-down]]] Turn an Assembly upside down to insert Fasteners (especially Screws).
[name::Use Balloon] [SpocWebEntityId::22388] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-weigt-lift]]] Use Helium Balloon to support Advertising Signs.

[name::use both directions] [SpocWebEntityId::22467] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-eliminate-idle]]] Print during the Return of a Printer Carriage–Dot Matrix Printer, Daisy Wheel Printers, Inkjet Printers.

[name::Use Compound Pressure] [SpocWebEntityId::22488] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-add-functions]]] A Soda Fountain Pump that runs on the Pressure of the Carbon Dioxide that is used to 'fizz' the Drinks.
[name::Vanes] [SpocWebEntityId::22365] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-merge-identical]]] Vanes in a ventilation system
[name::Venetian Blinds] [SpocWebEntityId::22344] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Fragment]]] Replace solid Shades with Venetian Blinds.
[name::Vibrate for Distribution] [SpocWebEntityId::22453] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-frequency]]] Distribute or concentrate Powder and other grainy Material with Vibration.
[name::Vibrate for flow] [SpocWebEntityId::22451] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-vibrate]]] Vibrate a casting mold while it is being filled to improve flow and structural properties.
[name::vibrating Blades] [SpocWebEntityId::22449] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-vibrate]]] Electric Carving Knife with vibrating Blades and electric Saw to allow the User to concentrate on Direction.
[name::vibrating Parts] [SpocWebEntityId::22419] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-movability]]] Abrasively cleaning Parts by vibrating the Parts instead of the Abrasive.
[name::Virtual Reality] [SpocWebEntityId::22496] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-use-copies]]] Virtual Reality via Computer instead of an expensive Vacation
[name::Vortex Strips] [SpocWebEntityId::22390] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-weight-environment]]] Vortex Strips improve Lift of Aircraft Wings.
[name::Vulcanize Rubber] [SpocWebEntityId::22538] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-change-flexibility]]] Vulcanize Rubber to change its Flexibility and Durability.

[name::Water Curtain] [SpocWebEntityId::22523] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-colored-tracer]]] A Water Curtain to protect Steel Mill Workers from overheating by blocking infrared Rays but not the bright Light from the melted Steel.

[name::weld Aluminum] [SpocWebEntityId::22490] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-add-functions]]] To weld Steel to Aluminum, create an Interface from alternating thin Strips of the 2 Materials. Cold weld the Surface into a single unit with Steel on one face and Copper on the other, then use normal welding techniques to attach the Steel Object to the Interface, and the Interface to the Aluminum.
[name::Welding Powder] [SpocWebEntityId::22345] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Fragment]]] Use powdered Welding Metal instead of Foil or Rod to get better Penetration of the Joint.
[name::wick Excess Solder] [SpocWebEntityId::22517] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-fractal-surface]]] Use a porous Metal Mesh to wick Excess Solder away from a Joint.

[name::Wing Shape] [SpocWebEntityId::22389] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-weight-environment]]] Aircraft Wing Shape reduces Air Density above the Wing, increases Density below Wing, to create Lift. (This also demonstrates Principle 4, Asymmetry).
[name::Work-Breakdown] [SpocWebEntityId::22340] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-Partition]]] Use a Work Breakdown Structure for a large Project.

[name::Worker-Pit] [SpocWebEntityId::22413] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-limit-changes]]] Automobile Engine Oil is changed by Workers in a Pit to avoid using expensive Lifting Equipment or unsafe Ramps.
[name::Zoom Lens] [SpocWebEntityId::22383] [Triz-Principle-Sub::[[Triz-allow-pass]]]
